description: Be sure to start your next run with footwear that offers as much comfort as possible. their Men’s Run Targeted Cushion Ankle Socks are designed with cushion on the most impact-prone areas—the ball and heel of the foot—as well as other feel-good features like mesh zones for breathability, a Virtually Seamless™ toe, and an Achilles tab to prevent slippage. Plus, because they’re made with responsibly sourced Merino wool, they’re naturally odor-resistant and temperature-regulating. And, with Indestructawool™ and Shred Shield™ technologies, they’re built to last, mile after mile.
name: Smartwool Run Targeted Cushion Ankle Socks - Mens

specs.value: 56% Merino Wool, 28% Nylon, 13% Recycled Nylon, 3% Elastane
